Reviews.Title: no problems
Reviews.Author: peter morales
Reviews.Content: got it on time ,  no problems , start right up. will buy other one..some people mite have problems, i'm just one of dose who got a good product.. happy.

Reviews.Title: Undeserving of one star
Reviews.Author: gwm "gwm"
Reviews.Content: I have owned several Razor phones over the years and certainly know the ins and outs of how to operate one.  This one arrived dead on arrival.  DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!  Not only is the phone dead but this seller is horrible, still waiting on return and refund instructions.  They are hateful, rude and extremely unworkable.

Reviews.Title: Thumbs down
Reviews.Author: truman jano
Reviews.Content: This product is not working as I expected. It doesn't have any charger and I couldn't find one form my end. Maybe buying usedproducts are not good on Amazon as new products.

Reviews.Title: this phone is awesome
Reviews.Author: Troy blackwell
Reviews.Content: this phone i love this phone it works like a champ so if anyone buys another phone like this one get it its the best thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Poor Phone
Reviews.Author: Jeff Frietch
Reviews.Content: I Returned this phone for a credit on it an have not recieved it yet. The phone is sorry an say a new phone, it was not new. Battery would not HOLD A CHARGE at all. So my advise is Bad Phone.

Reviews.Title: LOST money
Reviews.Author: Ryan Bonilla
Reviews.Content: I had to buy a sim card, phone service, and a battery all over again. The phone turned out to be deffective so i couldnt charge my phone. Ended up LOSING $70

Reviews.Title: bad quality
Reviews.Author: neon
Reviews.Content: The back did not fit so the battery kept falling and wouldnt stay charged. It didnt matter how much it charged it would die after one call.

Reviews.Title: Motorolla Razor V3 phone
Reviews.Author: Connie Gullion
Reviews.Content: I would rate it a 0.5; very disappointed in it. I ordered it for my husband for Christmas and as soon as the 14 day warranty was was up the phone started getting so heated that it would start burning him right through his shirt pocket. It also automatically shuts it self off. Very disappointed in this phone. His first phone (motorolla razor) last 3 yrs w/o any problems  until it fell out of his shirt pocket into a bowel of water.

Reviews.Title: Okay!!
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: Good buy at the time. It is not holding up well, but for the price it made sence. Still using, but may not last too much longer.

Reviews.Title: razr
Reviews.Author: Jennie
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift and when I got it the battery would not hold a charge. I got in touch with the company that I got it from and they sent me a replacement battery.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Faith Tolly
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. I just mainly use it to talk on. I don't do a lot of texting. Strictly for talking.

Reviews.Title: The phone arrive on time, all i did was put my sims card and i was back to talking and texting. The product not use it was new.
Reviews.Author: Teresa Custer
Reviews.Content: I brought this phone for a friend and  he had this phone before his other one stop working, this is the only phone he wanted. He loves his Motorola Razor.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Caleb Klapp
Reviews.Content: I have never had a product I bought on amazon that I rated below a 3 before until now. This product wouldn't charge instead just got extremely hot that you couldn'tEven hold it without feeling like your hand was burning. We were able to return for refund so that was nice customer service at least! Wound up buying a different phone model all together.

Reviews.Title: The lights on the key pad don't work
Reviews.Author: Alex Morelos
Reviews.Content: Key pad lights don't work. My old Razor that I works better all the lights work on it not very happy with my new Razor

Reviews.Title: don't waste you money!
Reviews.Author: javibarr
Reviews.Content: I got this item thinking it would work like my old razr...boy was I wrong!!...you will miss text and you will not be able to receive pictures. I bought a ten dollar gophone from at&t; that does a better than this thing. So like I said...don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Comment of AT & T Motorola RAZR v3
Reviews.Author: Selden F. Decker "MLM Man"
Reviews.Content: Not exactly the same features as my original Razr from ATT  The way names and numbers are displayed is different

Reviews.Title: Razor satisfaction comment
Reviews.Author: WandapATTERSON
Reviews.Content: It ts roo hard to prugram.  My husband went bak to his old phone even though it is worn out.

Reviews.Title: both phones do not close tight where the battery goes
Reviews.Author: Loretta L. Knoll
Reviews.Content: I have written to the place that sent the phone, they sent a different phone but no way for me to send it back to them. Both phones do not close tight where the battery goes. I really just want a phone that will seal up but would take a credit on my card and a return address to send them to the company I purchased them from.

Reviews.Title: For the price, not bad at all
Reviews.Author: Christa Britton "Christa Britton"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my boyfriend who does not wish to have internet on his phone, works great. The only thing is that the battery doesn't last that long, but personally I think that is all Razr phones.

Reviews.Title: old faithful comes through again
Reviews.Author: Claudio Stornelli
Reviews.Content: As always this flip phone doesn't fail. Phone was brand new and works perfectly. Fired right up once I had to fiddle a bit with the sim card. Older sim cards are a bit thin I think so I just placed a thin piece of cardboard to wedge the sim card closer. Works great.Shipped fast and priced right. Thanks

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: needed a backup phone for when my iphone died. i had a razr when it first came out years ago and loved it. and the battery life on this thing is AMAZING. i wish all phones were like this bad boy. was in great condition. and great price point.

Reviews.Title: its junk
Reviews.Author: timeclock1
Reviews.Content: ordered 2 new ones  they have very bad reception and volume only goes to 7 so you cannot hear who you are talking to they are cheap made will not reccomend .went back to nokia

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: AT&T Motorola RAZR V3 No Contract Quad Band GSM Camera Cell Phone Black
